title: Bussiness Networking
description: As the world slowly returns to normal, this physical event will be a refreshing experience featuring multiple networking sessions.

host.description: We had more than thirty five leads in the first ninety minutes of the conference.

title: Insight Session
description: Hear from global experts on the best practices in fintech and blockchain based applications, within the rapidly changing financial services sector.

title: Technology use-cases
description: Learn from early adopters and tech innovators about how fintech is impacting the organisations, their business functions and consumers at large.

host.description: We got to meet some unique solutions providers here!

title: Exihibition
description: Explore cutting-edge technology innovations to help build leaner processes, develop innovative products, improve security and automate tasks.

host.description: The quality of delegates is super notch!

title: Panel Discussions
description: Witness interactive discussion, debates and fire-side charts conducted by some of the greatest minds in fintech and blockchain space

host.description: The event has right decision makers and right policy makers.
